value.title: Extract in Power Query (LEN, LEFT, RIGHT in excel) - #6 (M)agic (M)ondays
value.excerpt: In today's video we will go through the equivalents of LEN, LEFT; RIGHT in Power Query. You can create very complex transformations using the interface in Power Query. value.title: How to fix the "Too many elements in the enumeration to complete..." pivot error in Power Query

In today's video I will show you why you get the error and two ways to fix it.  Here you can download all the pbix files: https://curbal.com/donwload-center
